title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Skills: The Meaning and Application of Intuition in Mathematics Education for Professional Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can recognize and explain their intuition when solving mathematical problems.
Learners can design problem-solving strategies using intuitive reasoning in real-world science education scenarios.
Learners can demonstrate the process of identifying and correcting intuitive errors through peer feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
